epic: Initiate Onboarding from Account (Sales Rep Experience)

stories.description: As a Sales Rep, I want to launch an onboarding modal from the Account record, so that I can initiate the onboarding process in-context.
As a Sales Rep, I want the system to enforce that all Account Contacts have defined roles, so that I can ensure accurate responsibility assignments before onboarding.
As a Sales Rep, I want the system to check for NDA and Program Base Application eligibility, so that I can only select valid vendor programs for onboarding.
As a Sales Rep, I want to search for and select from eligible Vendor Programs based on account eligibility, so that I can match the Account to the right program.
As a Sales Rep, I want the system to auto-create Opportunity, Onboarding, and linking records, so that I don't have to manually set them up.
As a Sales Rep, I want the modal to emit an event with relevant record IDs after onboarding is created, so that I can use this information in follow-up processes.

epic: Configure Vendor Program Onboarding Flow (Program Manager Experience)

stories.description: As a Program Manager, I want to launch a dynamic onboarding wizard from a Vendor Program, so that I can configure the onboarding process using guided steps.
As a Program Manager, I want the system to render LWC components based on metadata, so that the wizard remains flexible and scalable.
As a Program Manager, I want my progress in the onboarding wizard to be saved, so that I can return later and continue where I left off.
As a Program Manager, I want the system to enforce stage prerequisites using dependency logic, so that stages are completed in a valid, logical sequence.
As a Program Manager, I want to define requirement sets and associate them with vendor programs, so that onboarding tasks are tailored to program needs.
As a Program Manager, I want to set required credentials and training assignments, so that participants complete all necessary compliance steps.
As a Program Manager, I want to configure rules that auto-update the onboarding status based on requirement completion, so that statuses reflect actual progress in real-time.
As a Program Manager, I want to configure recipient groups and communication templates, so that onboarding notifications are automated and targeted.

epic: Evaluate and Automate Onboarding Status (Shared Logic)

stories.description: As a system, I want to trigger status evaluation logic when onboarding records are updated, so that the onboarding status reflects the current requirement state.

stories.summary: Support ALL / ANY / CUSTOM Rule Logic
stories.description: As a Program Manager, I want to define rules using ALL, ANY, or CUSTOM logic, so that I can model different status update conditions.

stories.summary: Evaluate Rule Conditions Against Requirement Statuses
stories.description: As a system, I want to compare requirement statuses against rules, so that I can determine whether a rule passes.

stories.summary: Update Onboarding Status When Rule Passes
stories.description: As a system, I want to update the Onboarding status when rule conditions are met, so that the record reflects its current state in the lifecycle.
